sentence.Network_en: It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
sentence.Network_cn: 伟大的门将不是靠神奇的扑救成就，而是靠注重小事和细节成功。（Tim Howard美国国家队门将）

sentence.Network_en: Mark had for some time been making advances towards her.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克追她已经有一段时间了。

sentence.Network_en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

做爱（Make Love）也称作爱、性爱，英文为make love。从广义上说，做爱是指雌雄异体动物种异性之间的交配行为。

jx.jx_en_mean: ensure someone's success or favourable development
jx.jx_cn_mean: 保证某人成功；保证某人顺利发展

lj.lj_ly: this place has been the making of me in many ways.
lj.lj_ls: 这地方在很多方面促成了我的成功。

jx.jx_en_mean: in the process of developing or being made
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在发展中；在形成中；在制造中

lj.lj_ly: a campaign that's been two years in the making.
lj.lj_ls: 已经准备了两年的一场运动。

entry.def: The making of something is the act or process of producing or creating it.

example.ex: ...Salamon's book about the making of this movie...
example.tran: 萨拉蒙有关本片制作过程的书

example.ex: Ducks' eggs are particularly prized for cake making.
example.tran: 鸭蛋在做糕饼时，格外重要。

entry.def: If you describe a person or thing as something in the making, you mean that they are going to become known or recognized as that thing.

example.ex: Her drama teacher is confident Julie is a star in the making...
example.tran: 朱莉的戏剧老师相信她会成为一颗冉冉升起的明星。

example.ex: I think it's a disaster in the making.
example.tran: 我认为这会是一场灾难。

entry.def: If something is the making of a person or thing, it is the reason that they become successful or become very much better than they used to be.

example.ex: This discovery may yet be the making of him.
example.tran: 这次的发现也许会成为他成功的契机。

entry.tran: 具备成为…的素质(或内在因素、必要条件、潜在能力)
entry.def: If you say that a person or thing has the makings of something, you mean it seems possible or likely that they will become that thing, as they have the necessary qualities.

example.ex: Godfrey had the makings of a successful journalist.
example.tran: 戈弗雷具有成为一名成功记者的潜质。

entry.tran: (问题等)自己造成的;咎由自取
entry.def: If you say that something such as a problem you have is of your own making, you mean you have caused or created it yourself.

example.ex: Some of the university's financial troubles are of its own making...
example.tran: 这所大学的一些经济困难是由其自身造成的。

example.ex: The Prime Minister, however, is now caught in a trap of her own making.
example.tran: 但是，首相现在却落入了她自己设下的圈套之中。

means.word_mean: 1. the act that results in something coming to be;

auth_sentence.content: Well done to the government for making the decision.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well done to the government for making the decision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well done to the government for making the decision.

auth_sentence.content: We are not making reforms because I want to.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are not making reforms because I want to.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are not making reforms because I want to.

auth_sentence.content: But now they seem to be making a comeback.
auth_sentence.res_content: But now they seem to be making a comeback.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But now they seem to be making a comeback.

means.word_mean: 是使人/事物成功(或顺利发展)的原因

sentences.en: It was only a small part on a TV show, but it was the making of her.
sentences.cn: 虽然这只是一个电视节目中的一个小角色，但卻使她成了名。

sentences.en: Those two years of hard work were the making of him.
sentences.cn: 那两年的艰苦奋斗奠定了他成功的基础。

means.word_mean: 在发展(或形成)中；在制造中

sentences.en: He’s very good at public speaking—I think he’s a politician in the making.
sentences.cn: 他擅长公开演讲─ 我认为他正在逐步成长为一个政治家。

means.word_mean: (问题或困难等)自己造成的；自作自受

sentences.en: The problem is of your own making, so don’t try to blame anyone else.
sentences.cn: 问题的责任在你自己，别想责怪他人。

sentences.en: These laboratory instruments are of our own making.
sentences.cn: 这些实验仪器都是我们自己制造的。
